trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from instances of a <xref:System.Double> that represent an object's length.
trans-unit.target: Converte a instâncias de outros tipos de e para instâncias de um <xref:System.Double>que representam o comprimento de um objeto.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: LengthConverter supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: Conversor de comprimento dá suporte à conversão de e para os seguintes tipos: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>e <xref:System.UInt64>.</xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.LengthConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.LengthConverter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether conversion is possible from a specified type to a <xref:System.Double> that represents an object's length.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a conversão é possível a partir de um tipo especificado para um <xref:System.Double>que representa o comprimento de um objeto.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter>oferece suporte à conversão de e para os seguintes tipos: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>e <xref:System.UInt64>.</xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String></xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether conversion is possible to a specified type from a <xref:System.Double> that represents an object's length.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion of the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion of the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: Provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações contextuais sobre um componente.

trans-unit.source: Represents culture-specific information that is maintained during a conversion.
trans-unit.target: Representa informações específicas de cultura que são mantidas durante uma conversão.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o objeto que está sendo convertido em <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Converts other types into instances of <xref:System.Double> that represent an object's length.

trans-unit.target: Descreve as informações de contexto de um componente, como seu contêiner e <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies culture-specific information, including the writing system and the calendar that is used.
trans-unit.target: Identifica as informações específicas de cultura, incluindo o sistema de escrita e o calendário que é usado.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Object>que está sendo convertido.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: O tipo de dados desta instância do <xref:System.Double>está sendo convertido em.</xref:System.Double>
